languages.text: "Зашоренность и узость ума с Торговым Патентом в руках... что за опасное сочетание..."
"Blinkered vision and a narrow mind — a Warrant of Trade in the hands of such a person is a dangerous prospect indeed..."
languages.original_text: "Зашоренность и узость ума с Торговым Патентом в руках... что за опасное сочетание..."

traits.locale_text: "Blinkered vision and a narrow mind — a Warrant of Trade in the hands of such a person is a dangerous prospect indeed..."
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: “井底之蛙，一叶障目。贸易授状落到这样的人手里，确实是个非常危险的预兆……”
languages.original_text: "Blinkered vision and a narrow mind — a Warrant of Trade in the hands of such a person is a dangerous prospect indeed..."

traits.locale_text: “井底之蛙，一叶障目。贸易许可证落到这样的人手里，确实是个非常危险的预兆……”
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: «Estrech{mf|o|a} de miras y cargad{mf|o|a} de prejuicios. La idea de que la Patente de Comercio esté en manos de una persona así se me antoja peligrosa, sin duda...».
languages.original_text: "Blinkered vision and a narrow mind — a Warrant of Trade in the hands of such a person is a dangerous prospect indeed..."

traits.locale_text: «Estrech{mf|o|a} de miras y cargad{mf|o|a} de prejuicios. La idea de que la Patente de Comercio esté en manos de una persona así se me antoja peligrosa, sin duda...».
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: 「目隠しされた視界と狭い心…そのような人物の手に通商許可証が渡されるのは、実に先行きが危ういものです…」
languages.original_text: "Blinkered vision and a narrow mind — a Warrant of Trade in the hands of such a person is a dangerous prospect indeed..."

traits.locale_text: 「目隠しされた視界と狭い心…そのような人物の手に通商許可証が渡されるのは、実に先行きが危ういものです…」
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: « Une vision bornée couplée à un esprit étroit. Une lettre de marque entre les mains d'un tel individu représente une perspective glaçante... »
languages.original_text: "Blinkered vision and a narrow mind — a Warrant of Trade in the hands of such a person is a dangerous prospect indeed..."

traits.locale_text: « Une vision bornée couplée à un esprit étroit. Une lettre de marque entre les mains d'un tel individu représente une perspective glaçante... »
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: "Scheuklappen und Engstirnigkeit – ein Handelsbrief in den Händen so einer Person, das ist wirklich gefährlich ..."
languages.original_text: "Blinkered vision and a narrow mind — a Warrant of Trade in the hands of such a person is a dangerous prospect indeed..."

traits.locale_text: "Scheuklappen und Engstirnigkeit – ein Handelsbrief in den Händen so einer Person, das ist wirklich gefährlich ..."
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: "Dar görüşlülük ve kapalı bir zihin. Ticari Ruhsatname'nin böylesine birinin elinde olması, gerçekten de tehlikeli bir durum."
languages.original_text: "Blinkered vision and a narrow mind — a Warrant of Trade in the hands of such a person is a dangerous prospect indeed..."

traits.locale_text: "Dar görüşlülük ve kapalı bir zihin. Ticari Ruhsatname'nin böylesi bir kişinin elinde olması gerçekten de tehlikeli bir durum."
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina
